answerText: Buenos Aires[10] Buenos Aires is located slightly downstream from where two rivers merge to form the Rio de la Plata. Name either.
heading: DRAGOON |2013 | 11 | 1 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This city's San Telmo neighborhood boasts a long-running antique fair and is a haven for dancers. For 10 points each: [10] Name this city on the south shore of the Rio de la Plata, the capital of Argentina.
